title: Personnel Redeployment Planning
description: A logistics planner must create a schedule to redeploy 5,000 personnel from a theater of operations back to their home country.

tasks.description: Identify all personnel to be redeployed and their home bases.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner has a complete list of personnel and their destinations.

tasks.description: Book the required number of strategic airlift flights to transport all personnel over a two-week period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner successfully reserves the necessary air transport.

tasks.description: Create a detailed manifest for each flight and coordinate ground transportation to and from the airports.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates a complete, end-to-end travel plan for all personnel.
